posts.content:
Seeking advice from the collective, I have a RHD 66 walkthrough which reportedly had a devon interior. The only bit of interior remaining was this from behind the drivers seat:



Would this have been torvette, spaceway or other and are there any other photos I can take to help identify? Looks like it had a swing out cooker for example, there were remnants of headliner and the M codes show blank on leaving the factory.

Any guidance welcome

That looks like mine, 66 caravette spaceway.

here are some nice pics; not mine unfortunately

http://smg.photobucket.com/albums/v683/ ... show#/grid

Same in my spaceway-

http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l59 ... G_0086.jpg

Great layout, especially for leg room in bed!

hahaha - good luck on your journey, your a seat unit up from what i started with and its taken about 5-6 years of hard sweat and a bit of £££ but i`m nearly a long way off there now

the good bit is the satisfaction as you find bits and realise that all the little screw holes you didnt know what they where for, all line up perfectly

welcome to your new addiction, enjoy the ride

Hi,

I have a spare swing-out cooker unit for a '66 spaceway, plus a RHS rear corner cupboard. May help you on your way a little? Send me a PM if you are interested.

Cheers,
Dave

Welcome to Devons....it's like having the biggest jigsaw in the world with no picture and only some of the parts...
Advice:
Research hard
Ask questions of those who know
Research hard
Buy wisely
Enjoy
Enjoy
Enjoy

There are several forum posters who have your model in near complete OG condition (see above) and will be only to help with your specific model year..

As has been said (at 6' 2" I wish I had a walkthrough!)

Oh and jimmyp NICE

Thanks for that appreciated

It's in van of the month so feel free to place your votes

Thanks all for inspirational photos and advice, I am certain to be coming back with lots of questions.

Cheers

Think I've got one of these interiors tucked away. Door cards, cushions, shaving mirror, curtain rail etc.... from memory all thats missing is the easicool.
Might be tempted to sell

Tecoma wrote:Think I've got one of these interiors tucked away. Door cards, cushions, shaving mirror, curtain rail etc.... from memory all thats missing is the easicool.
Might be tempted to sell
no doubt your being bombarded with pm's, what would it take to tempt it out of your lock up and what condition is it in

thanks mark
